name: @rainstormy/presets-eslint-preact
description: A predefined, opinionated ESLint configuration suitable for any web project with Preact components.
author: Steffen Diswal

dependencies.@rainstormy/presets-eslint: This ESLint preset ships with type definitions for ESLint presets and their configurable options.
dependencies.@rainstormy/presets-eslint-jsx: This ESLint preset configures linting rules for JSX components such as Preact components.
dependencies.@rainstormy/presets-eslint-react: This ESLint preset configures linting rules for React-like components such as Preact components.

devDependencies.typescript: TypeScript is a statically typed programming language on top of JavaScript.

peerDependencies.eslint: ESLint is a peer dependency of `@rainstormy/presets-eslint`.
